title: Install Boot-Repair in Ubuntu
description: Ubuntu boot-repair can be used to fix a broken grub install if you have access to an Ubuntu live ISO.

fields.name: Steps to Install Boot-Repair
fields.value:
- boot the Ubuntu live ISO or an Ubuntu install
- connect to the Internet
- open a terminal and type the following commands (press `Enter` after each line):
```
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:yannubuntu/boot-repair
sudo apt update
sudo apt install -y boot-repair
boot-repair
```
